author.name: Ishan Dongol
author.bio: He is a professional web developer / software engineer, currently pursuing his Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence at Kathmandu University.  His area of expertise is React with Typescript. He also has sound knowledge of other languages/frameworks like Node.js, MongoDB, Python, Rust, Docker, Gitlab, and AWS.

data.title: A simple Github Blogs Creator Native Application
data.excerpt: A simple pet project that generates gray-matter .md files to plug into a jamstack web app.

post.content:
A simple pet project that generates .md files to plug into a jamstack web app.

Made with Tauri. React as frontend and Rust as backend.
